item.title: Understanding how to make models
item.dc:creator: @wolf_scaper wolf scaper
item.description:
@wolf_scaper wrote:

:\ i dont have too little brains…thi is what i used…im stuck on this because the stupid codes for rotations… its a really cool weapon… i made a special attack for it…when it special attacks the game goes slow-mo for all players and it reaps a giant claw on all players… of course this works with my sara gs…

but anyways…i want this weapon because it’s a multi weapon… the blade is a bow-string made of bandos… the edges are strong spirit pouches made of armadyl… the 2 handle brackets that seperate the hilt from the blade are filled with runes… and the hilts is a giant ws (stands for wolf scaper)

in the end the special attack looks like tazers of runes zapping the spirit wolf pouches and then the wolf summoning through a rip and using his claws to shred the enemy…then as it goies back the bandos bow string uses all 4 gs specials on the other player…

screen shots when i find out how to make the model…

NOTE: i alredy have that animation made…

NOTE2: dont ask how i got it i used the sara gs and framed the special my way…so ye…all you guys…thanks to

cocoa

and

galkon

for helping me with model making…

-wolf scaper

Read full topic

item.title: Understanding how to make models
item.dc:creator: @wolf_scaper wolf scaper
item.description:
@wolf_scaper wrote:

ok, for all mods or admins dont mute me…im questioning something…no rules against that…

ok…i made models of my own on met.

made them dat files then winrar archive files

put them in my client…but how do i add them in class8???

i’ve trie many times…but i get thread error -4… for puting this in

         if(i == 15344)
		        {
		            class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
		            class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";
		            class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
		            class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
		            class8.anIntArray156[0] = 61;
		            class8.anInt174 = 17001;
		            class8.anInt169 = 4;
		            class8.anInt181 = 1892;
		            class8.anInt190 = 415;
		            class8.anInt198 = 1770;
		            class8.anInt194 = 32;
		            class8.anInt204 = 844;
		            class8.anInt165 = 17001;
		            class8.anInt200 = 17001;
		            class8.aBoolean176 = false;
		            class8.aString170 = "wolfs godsword";
		            class8.aByteArray178 = "spirit of the wolves combined!".getBytes();
        }

wtf am i doing wrong???

Read full topic
